journalism.translation[0].definitions[0]: the job or activity of writing news reports for newspapers, magazines, television, or radio
The hospital has been the target of investigative journalism  (=journalism that examines an event or situation in order to find out the truth).
journalism.translation[1].definitions[0]: the job or activity of writing news reports for newspapers, magazines, television, or radio
Two Wall Street Journal reporters won awards for distinguished business and financial journalism.
